1.speaker: A
sentence: My stomach feels heavy from indigestion.

2.speaker: B
sentence: You shouldn't have eaten so much at the buffet.
너는 먹지 말았어야 했어 많이 뷔페에서.

3.speaker: A
sentence: You talked me into going there.

4.speaker: B
sentence: Don't blame me for your eating too much.

5.speaker: A
sentence: I need to go on a diet or something.

6.speaker: B
sentence: I can't take it anymore. I hate the way you talk.
난 더 이상 못 참어. 난 싫어 그 방식이 너가 말하는.
